entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7 except plus 2 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7 except plus 2 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:04 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:04 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
